treatments.organic_treatment: Apply copper-based fungicide (Bordeaux mixture) every 7 days. Remove and destroy infected plants. Ensure good air circulation.
treatments.chemical_treatment: Metalaxyl + Mancozeb spray (2g/L water) every 7-10 days. Alternate with Chlorothalonil for resistance management.
treatments.application_method: Foliar spray covering both sides of leaves

treatments.organic_treatment: Spray neem oil solution (3%) twice weekly. Apply Trichoderma viride at 5g/L water. Ensure proper field drainage.
treatments.chemical_treatment: Tricyclazole 75% WP at 0.6g/L water. Apply Carbendazim 50% WP at 1g/L for severe infections.
treatments.application_method: Spray during early morning or evening hours
prevention_tips: Apply silicon fertilizer for plant strengthening

treatments.organic_treatment: Mix 1 tablespoon baking soda + 1 tablespoon vegetable oil in 1 gallon water. Spray weekly. Apply sulfur dust.
treatments.chemical_treatment: Sulfex 80% WP at 2-3g/L water. Alternate with Triadimefon 25% WP for resistance management.

treatments.organic_treatment: Remove infected crop residue. Apply sulfur-based fungicides. Use resistant varieties for next season.
treatments.chemical_treatment: Propiconazole 25% EC at 1ml/L water. Apply Tebuconazole if resistance develops.
treatments.application_method: Foliar spray at flag leaf stage

treatments.organic_treatment: Remove infected plants immediately. Control whitefly vectors using neem oil spray. Use yellow sticky traps.
treatments.chemical_treatment: Imidacloprid 17.8% SL at 0.5ml/L for whitefly control. No direct viral cure available.
treatments.application_method: Spray every 10-15 days during growing season

treatments.organic_treatment: Apply copper oxychloride at 3g/L. Remove and burn infected plants. Ensure proper field drainage.
treatments.chemical_treatment: Streptocycline 9% + Tetracycline 1% at 1g/10L water. Spray copper hydroxide for prevention.
treatments.application_method: Spray at tillering and booting stage

symptoms: Dark concentric rings on leaves (target pattern)
treatments.organic_treatment: Apply Bacillus subtilis bio-fungicide. Mulch to prevent soil splash. Remove lower leaves.
treatments.chemical_treatment: Mancozeb 75% WP at 2.5g/L water. Alternate with Azoxystrobin for better control.
prevention_tips: Stake plants for better air flow

treatments.organic_treatment: Plant early maturing varieties. Spray sulfur-based fungicides during early infection.
treatments.chemical_treatment: Azoxystrobin 23% SC at 1ml/L water. Apply Propiconazole if severe.

symptoms: Yellow angular spots on upper leaf surface
treatments.organic_treatment: Spray Bordeaux mixture (1%) at 10-day intervals. Improve air circulation. Remove infected leaves.
treatments.chemical_treatment: Metalaxyl-M 4% + Mancozeb 64% WP at 2g/L water. Alternate with Dimethomorph.

treatments.organic_treatment: Spray neem oil (1500 ppm) at 5ml/L. Apply Trichoderma viride. Prune infected parts.
treatments.chemical_treatment: Carbendazim 50% WP at 1g/L water. Alternate with Copper oxychloride.
treatments.application_method: Spray at flowering and fruit development

treatments.organic_treatment: Apply Trichoderma harzianum to soil. Remove and burn infected plants. Soil solarization.
treatments.chemical_treatment: Carbendazim soil drench at 2g/L water. Apply Copper oxychloride foliar spray.
treatments.application_method: Soil application and foliar spray combination

treatments.organic_treatment: Remove infected plants immediately. Apply Pseudomonas fluorescens. Soil solarization for 4-6 weeks.
treatments.chemical_treatment: Streptocycline 100ppm + Copper oxychloride 0.3% spray. Soil drenching with bleaching powder.

symptoms: Circular brown spots with gray centers
treatments.organic_treatment: Apply neem-based fungicides. Remove infected leaves. Use crop rotation.
treatments.chemical_treatment: Mancozeb 75% WP at 2g/L water. Alternate with Carbendazim for better results.

symptoms: Small circular spots with dark borders
treatments.organic_treatment: Remove lower infected leaves. Apply copper-based sprays. Mulch to prevent soil splash.
treatments.chemical_treatment: Chlorothalonil 75% WP at 2g/L water. Alternate with Mancozeb.

treatments.organic_treatment: Continue regular monitoring. Maintain balanced nutrition. Ensure adequate water supply.
treatments.chemical_treatment: No chemical treatment needed. Focus on preventive measures.
